::Destron Base/Bobertron::

    Bobertron had gone back to the command room and linked again with the 
computer. An overload of systems had merged parts of his mind with that of 
the ship's computers. The computer voice was now superimposed with that of 
Bobertron's voice, he literally was the ship.
    "Scanners report that a mass of Predacons are converging on the 
Cybertronian Fire. The Maximals are preparing defenses. Unit Cheetor is among 
them."
    "Interesting, this could be used well in the plans," Bobertron said in 
repliance to what the computer had just stated. "Mantella, Shredder, 
CyberShark, Battera, the Destrocons, stop what you are doing. I have a plan. 
We are going to allie with the Maximals. They are about to be attacked by the 
Predacons, I wish for us to help them. Now no matter how much you dislike 
them, help them."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::CyberShark::

    Leaving the Iron Fist he flew away toward the Cybertronian Fire. Once he 
was out of weapons range of the Iron Fist he decloaked. He was feeling 
extremly tired, the cloak had taken a lot out of him. He turned his jets to 
maximum burn so he could get there all the faster and get back all the faster.
